entities.name: stan
entities.description: Stan is the conductor of the Knight Bus. He is mentioned as telling his passengers about Harry's incident with Aunt Marge.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who broke wizard law by inflating Aunt Marge. He is feeling miserable and restless on the Knight Bus.

entities.name: ern
entities.description: Ern is a passenger of the Knight Bus who is mentioned as confirming Harry's presence on the bus.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is a wizard who broke wizard law and is mentioned as an example by Harry.

entities.name: aunt marge
entities.description: Aunt Marge is Harry's aunt whom he inflated with magic. This incident has caused him to worry about being sent to Azkaban.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the Hogwarts gamekeeper who spent two months in Azkaban last year and is mentioned as an example of someone who was terrified by the thought of going there.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is a wizard prison where Hagrid spent two months. Harry is worried about being sent there after breaking wizard law.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school for wizards and witches where Hagrid works as the gamekeeper.

relationships.description: Stan told his passengers about Harry's incident with Aunt Marge.
Ern confirmed that Harry was present on the Knight Bus.
Harry mentioned Sirius Black as an example of someone who broke wizard law like him.
Harry inflated Aunt Marge with magic, causing her to be upset.
